title: FOTO Što to testira Kim Jong Un? AI dronove samoubojice!
description: Sjevernokorejski vođa Kim Jong-un obišao je u četvrtak vojne poligone i provjerio kako teče razvoj novih bespilotnih letjelica ratnog zrakoplovstva. Dron izgleda kao iz znanstveno-fantastičnih filmova, a, kako piše Mirror, ima sposobnost pokretanja samoubilačkih napada na kopnu i moru. Letjelice pokreće umjetna inteligencija i sposobne su za izviđanje na velikim udaljenostima. Ako uoče metu koju Sjeverna Koreja smatra opasnom, sposobne su prebaciti se u napadački način djelovanja i pokrenuti kamikaza-napad.
title_translated: Photo tested by Kim Jong UN? Ai drones of suicide!
description_translated: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un visited the military training ground on Thursday and checked that the development of new unmanned aircraft aircraft flows. The drone looks like scientific fiction films, and, as Mirror writes, has the ability to launch suicide attacks on the mainland and sea. The spacecraft is powered by artificial intelligence and are capable of reconnaissance at long distances. If they notice the target North Korea considers dangerous, they are capable of switching to the offensive mode of action and triggering a kamikaza-finish.

title: Britanski glumac i aktivist optužen za seksualno uznemiravanje, prijeti mu zatvor
description: Metropolitanska policija podigla je optužnicu protiv Foxa prema članku 66A Zakona o seksualnim deliktima iz 2003. godine, nakon istrage pokrenute zbog objave na društvenoj mreži X (bivši Twitter) u travnju 2024. Fox je navodno podijelio tzv. 'upskirting' fotografiju voditeljice Narinder Kaur (52), snimljenu bez njezinog pristanka prije više od 15 godina, dok je izlazila iz taksija
title_translated: British actor and activist charged with sexual harassment, threatening him to prison
description_translated: Metropolitan police have indicted Fox under Article 66a Law on Sexual Delicts of 2003, after an investigation launched for posting on the Social Network X (formerly Twitter) in April 2024. Fox allegedly shared the so -called The 'Upning' photo of presenter Narender Kaur, 52, taken without her consent more than 15 years ago, while she was coming out of the taxi

Objava je prouzročila manji potres na burzama, ali i zabrinula dosad naizgled nenadmašnog zapadnog vladara velikih jezičnih modela OpenAI, dovodeći u pitanje same temelje zapadnog pogleda na razvoj AI modela uvođenjem inovacija koje su, barem dijelom, posljedica nametnutih sankcija SAD-a Indiji i Kini na Nvidijine čipove. No, zašto su ti, dosad većini nepoznati, modeli toliko važni za daljnji razvoj umjetne inteligencije, što to znači, ne samo za Kinu i SAD, nego za EU i ostatak svijeta, te je li doista došlo do promjene paradigme u svijetu velikih jezičnih modela i drugih modela generativne umjetne inteligencije, pokušat ćemo otkriti na sljedećim stranicama...
title_translated: Global Wars of Genai Model - East Against the West
description_translated: The moment when Deepseek, now a well-known Chinese AI startup, presented its advanced large language model Deepseek-R1 in late January, echoed hard throughout the technological community that deals with artificial intelligence. The announcement has caused a smaller earthquake on the stock markets, but also worried so far the seemingly unsurpassed western ruler of the large language models of Openi, questioning the very foundation of the western view of the development of the AI ​​model by introducing innovations that, at least partly, are the consequence of the imposed sanctions of the US India and China on Nvidia's chips. But why are these, so far unknown, the models are so important for further development of artificial intelligence, which means, not only for China and the United States, but for the EU and the rest of the world, and whether there has been a change in paradigm in the world of large language models and other models of generative artificial intelligence, we will try to discover on the following pages ...

In the 52th minute, the phenomenal striker put the 'point on and' his excellent performances. He scored a beautiful goal from a free kick to complete a hat-trick. Sporting ultimately celebrated 3-1 and retained the lead in the championship with 72 points.

The owner of the burning apartment was able to save himself, and the firefighters extinguished the fire, prevented further expansion of fire and saved two children from other apartments in the building. In the latter, they also used a breathing apparatus.

It is estimated that in the world more than a billion people between the ages of 30-79 have hypertension, with half of them not even aware of it. In Croatia, 40 percent of people die from cardiovascular diseases, caused by high blood pressure.

description: Istraživači s Max Planck instituta za evolucijsku antropologiju proučavali su kako se značenja 12 različitih glasanja čimpanzi mijenjaju kada se kombiniraju u parove i tvore jezik, a ne obične zvukove upozorenja ili vokalizacije kako se do sada tvrdilo
title_translated: Chimpanzees are capable of complex communication and have their own language
description_translated: Researchers with the Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology have studied that the meanings of 12 different votes are changing when combined into pairs and forming language, not ordinary warnings or vocalizations as it has been claimed so far

title: Neymar nikad nije čuo za najtraženijeg nogometaša svijeta; pogledajte bizaran video koji se širi Internetom
description: Čovjek je najtraženiji igrač svijeta, za njega milijune nude Real, Liverpool i Bayern, ali Neymar nema pojma o kome se radi.

description_translated: Man is the most sought after player in the world, for him millions are offered by Real, Liverpool and Bayern, but Neymar has no idea what he is about.

title: 'Hajduk je napravio jedini logičan potez. Preduvjeti za uspjeh su sad tu'
description: Hajduk je imao nevjerojatnu priliku da nakon 20 godina napokon osvoji naslov prvaka. No, katastrofalna završnica sezona je upropastila sve i Splićani su se morali zadovoljiti tek trećim mjestom. Gennaro Gattuso je otišao, otišli su i otići će neki igrači, neki će i doći, a pitanje je trenutka kad će potpisati novi trener Gonzalo Garcia.
title_translated: 'Hajduk made the only logical move. Prerequisites for success are now here '
description_translated: Hajduk had an incredible opportunity to finally win the title after 20 years. However, the catastrophic final of the season ruined everyone and the Split team had to be satisfied only in third place. Gennaro Gattuso left, they left and some players will leave, some will come, and the question is when he will sign the new coach Gonzalo Garcia.

title: Je li ovo razlog katastrofalne sezone Reala? Mbappe ne razgovara s ova četiri suigrača

title_translated: Is this the reason for the catastrophic season of Real? Mbappe does not talk to these four teammates
description_translated: Behind Real is one of the most annoying seasons in recent years. Last year, the kings also took the Champions League and La Liga, and this season they lost everything.

title: Španjolci pitali AI tko u Realu može zamijeniti Modrića; dobili su samo dva imena
description: 13 godina i 'tisuću' trofeja te liderska crta koju će teško bilo koji nogometaš u budućnosti moći nadmašiti. To je ostavština Luke Modrića u kraljevskom klubu koji će napustiti na kraju ove sezone.

description_translated: 13 years and a 'thousand' trophy and a leader line that is hard to surpass any footballer in the future. It is Luka Modric's legacy at the Royal Club, who will leave at the end of this season.

title: Ponoćna transfer bomba! Ronaldo će potpisati ugovor, ali samo ako mu se ispuni jedan uvjet
description: Cristiano Ronaldo ponovno je izazvao lavinu komentara u nogometnoj javnosti. Ovog puta povod je bila enigmatična objava na društvenim mrežama, nakon koje su mnogi pomislili da Portugalac napušta Saudijsku Arabiju.
title_translated: Midnight transfer bomb! Ronaldo will sign the contract but only if one condition is fulfilled
description_translated: Cristiano Ronaldo again caused an avalanche of comments in the football public. This time, the occasion was an enigmatic post on social networks, after which many thought the Portuguese was leaving Saudi Arabia.

title: Guardiola prekinuo pregovore s Barcom i šokirao izjavom: 'Ne treba mi, nije on naša razina'
description: Manchester City se priprema za ljeto velikih promjena. Nakon sezone u kojoj su ostali bez ijednog trofeja – trećeg mjesta u Premier ligi i poraza od Crystal Palacea u finalu FA Kupa – jasno je da Pep Guardiola planira ozbiljno presložiti kadar za sljedeću sezonu.
title_translated: Guardiola interrupted negotiations with Barca and shocked by saying, 'I don't need it, he's not our level'
description_translated: Manchester City prepares for the summer of major changes. After a season where they were left without a single trophy - third place in the Premier League and defeat to Crystal Palace in the FA Cup final - it is clear that Pep Guardiola plans to seriously overcome the staff for next season.

title: The Lemonheads u Zagrebu sviraju kultni album "Come on Feel the Lemonheads"

title: Pariz: Neredi nakon povijesnog trijumfa. Huligani razbijali stanice, sukobili se s policijom

Na aveniji Champs Elysees razbijeno je nekoliko autobusnih stanica, a pripadnici interventne policije zasuti su raznim projektilima. Policija je na koncu suzavcem i vodenim topovima morala smiriti masu navijača. Došlo je i do sukoba s policijom na pariškoj obilaznici, a najmanje dva automobila su zapaljena u blizini PSG-ovog stadiona Parka prinčeva

description_translated: A crazy celebration broke out all over the French capital on Saturday night after PSG destroyed Inter in the Champions League final, but later conflicts with police have spoiled the party somewhat. Several bus stops have been broken on Champs Elysees, and members of the emergency police have been lagging on various missiles. The police had to calm the mass of fans at the end of tear gas and water cannons. There was also a confrontation with the Paris bypass police, and at least two cars were set on fire near PSG's Park Prince Park Park
